reference.shortdesc: Media loop settings specify whether the referenced media restarts automatically when it has completed playing.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Media loop settings are modeled on the loop attribute on HTML5 media elements. If media loop settings are not present, the default behavior is determined by the user agent that is used to present the media.

dlentry.dd: The value is fixed to loop.

Specifies whether the media resource loops when played. The following values are recognized:
true Default. Looped playback is enabled.
false Looped playback is disabled.
